meanings.definition: Paying attention to or taking notice of something.
meanings.sent1: The heeding child watched the birds in the park.
meanings.sent2: She is a heeding student who always listens in class.
meanings.sent3: The heeding puppy barked at its own reflection.
meanings.sent4: The heeding squirrel cautiously approached the bird feeder.
meanings.sent5: The heeding detective noticed the smallest details at the crime scene.

meanings.definition: Listening to and following advice or warnings.
meanings.sent1: He is a heeding friend who always gives good advice.
meanings.sent2: The heeding hiker followed the trail markers carefully.
meanings.sent3: The heeding driver avoided the traffic jam by taking a detour.
meanings.sent4: The heeding traveler packed an umbrella despite the sunny forecast.
meanings.sent5: The heeding captain steered the ship away from the storm.
